document_data.mainbody:
House Hrost Uluar was one of the ruling drow Houses of Menzoberranzan in the Northdark in the late 13 and early 14 centuries DR.
House Hrost Uluar rose to its Ruling Council status sometime before the , when it held the seat of the fifth House of Menzoberranzan. By the , Hrost Uluar took the fourth Houses place after the fall of House DeVir. However, 1328 DR also took House Hrost Uluars seat, leaving it likely completely destroyed at the hands of House Xorlarrin,
